item.description:
2010 Robo Health Summit: Improving the Quality of Healthcare with Robotics
When: Wednesday, October 20, from 1:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m.
Where: Park Plaza Hotel
Boston, MA
Register: http://masstlc.homest...
MassTLC is working with Partners HealthCareâ€™s Connected Health Symposium to look at how Robotics is impacting healthcare and improving the lives of patients. This symposium will explore a full range of robotics applications in healthcare from robotics in surgery to robotics solutions for assisting the elderly. Each session will examine the latest products as well as future research, with a focus on how these innovative tools are impacting the quality of care in our lives today and in years to come.
item.name: 2010 Robo Health Summit: Improving the Quality of Healthcare with Robotics
